name: geysershitdick
text: I think this might be my favorite strip. The juxtaposition of these two utterly bizarre concepts (the worst invention on earth and a rapping dog who loves) is amazing. The alt text rounds it out into the funniest sans-punchline joke I've ever seen.

name: petitegitan
text: Actually I think it's a pretty amazing invention.  Candles have been left burning all night, in a flagrant display of non-safe procedures and house burning risks.

name: tourach3
text: my roommate and i would totally buy about fifty of these

name: laserblade
text: But, what, you have to check it every five minutes?

name: rowboat
text: Um, the exact opposite of that, I think.

name: laserblade
text: I'm talking about, like, when you're not taking a shit.  When you just want the candle to keep burning.

name: rowboat
text: Well then, my friend, do not purchase the Shitandle.

name: laserblade
text: WELL FINE MAYBE I WON'T

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Ray will market it with a free "regular" candle for when you're not taking a shitski.

name: quinlaenar
text: I had to give this a chubby because I read it as Vladmir Putin getting all crazy and pissed off like he does and going "WELL FINE MAYBE I WON'T" and that is just awesome.

name: belgand
text: They need to also make the Shitandle Plus for those of us who may need to take lengthy shits that exceed the 5 minute window. Shitandle Rx which is for those of us who are actually ill and is only available with a prescription. Not to mention the innovative Shitandle Ghost which is capable of adjusting itself for those times when you think you have to shit, but actually do not and will correspondingly shut off early.

name: sp1derbaby
text: I hear ya. Sometimes in work, the "smart" light turns off in the bathroom while I'm in the stall. There is no sensor in the stall ("smart") so you can imagine how fun that gets. This scenario affects my choice of mobile phone.

name: belgand
text: My old lab had that problem as well. The back bench where I worked also wasn't really covered by the sensor and I was often the only person working in there. It's always fun to have the lights go out when you're in the middle of a delicate operation that's part of a process requiring at least a week.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
You are.
Full of shit.

name: njury
text:
Or, the Piece-of-Paper ! A brilliant invention upon wich you write that you have a candle left burning.

There is also a cheaper alternatice available for all you cheap-o's: Your-own-Arm , wich is used exactly like the Piece-of-Paper . It does have the downside of having to explain to your friends why you have written "Don't forget candle after shit." on your arm.

Heartbeatzz is a member of the Dog Pound.

name: charchar
text: Exactly what Heartbeatzz, the Rapping Dog who Loves loves remains a tantalising mystery.

name: heccibiggs
text: There is no specific obeject or person that he loves. He just loves, continually. It's what he does. He can't help it.

name: woodenteeth
text:
He just Loves, continually, laying awake at night, bursting with Love, wondering aimlessly when he's not dropping tight flows, grabbing at people as they walk by... weeping slightly.

So much Love to give.

name: boredom_man
text: Hey, I just read your anti-smoking rant. This isn't going to get better, between us. Ignore User it is -- we can do that one thing together.

name: woodenteeth
text: Wait... what? I'm being ignored? Really? I feel so dirty.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Did...did he Ignore you because he occasionally disagreed with some of your opinions?

boredom_man is a dick.

name: woodenteeth
text: It is a strange thing that has happened.

name: zem
text: i haven't seen the rant in question but if it is actually a rant i could see being turned off of a person entirely from it

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I'm a non-smoker who's pretty supportive of smokers. I have my personal sins, and I would be a hypocrite through and through to infringe in kind.

But still, woodenteeth is a pretty sensible guy on assetbar. If you disagree with what he says about a quasi-political issue, then alright. But ignoring somebody for that seems pretty unnecessary.

"Ignore" should be used more on people that post numerous pics of hog-fluffing from Fire Island parties and shit.

name: zem
text:
whatev, i want to see the rant now. i'm curious.

oh and you can ignore anyone you want i don't care

name: zem
text: whatev, i want to see the rant now. i'm curious. anyway you can ignore whoever you want that's cool with me

name: zem
text: what the hell it completely froze my browser the first time i posted this and it did not appear when i loaded the page again!! argh

name: even_deader
text:
Eeeegh.

OK. Woodenteeth is, in fact, reasonable. Working from a vantage of no education or cultural literacy, he gave lectures on not smoking and not having suicidal thoughts. When called out on the outrageousness of the latter, he blushed it off with a comment about how much he loves to party. I found him a reasonable, irritating nitwit, and in a fit of childish pique I told him I was ignoring him. He's not evil; he's a middle-school teacher, a social worker. I have no idea if his comments qualified as a "rant;" I don't really remember them. I was right to ignore him because he was boring; I had no need to tell him so, but as injustices go I would think that one's fairly minor.

Finepinebox, for his part, has been wandering around Assetbar, responding to all my threads, bitching about this, for a fucking year , long after I left this place as the sje & daidai shithole it had become. That is not boring; that is hilarious. I haven't ignored Asherdan, either.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Huh?! Man, this is totally outta left field! I'm goin', "What?"

Ha, seriously, though - guy comes back on assetbar and calls other people boring and bitchy, and makes a confusing, bitter statement about the whole place being a "daidai shithole" and somehow tries to sound high & mighty.

I'm sorry I responded to some recent comment in a thread you were involved in a year ago. Oh wait you just did that too!

Sorry, boredom_man/even_deader. I don't really remember you...?

name: woodenteeth
text: I liked the no education and cultural literacy bit. That man knows words.

text:

I like to party...

etc.
